title: The Trap
opening: After taking Saul, a priest of St.Elimine, and Dorothy, his bodyguard, into their ranks, Roy and company enter Thria, southeast of Ostia.
Thria is governed by Lord Orun, Hector's half brother. Orun's home castle seems a safe place to stay.

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: I snuck in here no problem, but there's nothing worth stealing! Hmm, looks like the north hall has all the valuables, but with that security- ...Are those footsteps?

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: I trust everything is under control.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Yes, milord, the soldiers are stationed all around the castle.

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: Once they're inside and have their guard down, ambush them, just as with Lord Orun.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Yes, milord.

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: I want Princess Guinivere alive. The rest you can do with as you wish. Now go.

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: Ha ha ha ha... First the Silver Wolf's granddaughter, and now Princess Guinivere... With so much to offer, Bern is certain to allow us to join them.

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: Hmmm... Now isn't that interesting.

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: Finally we can get a good night's rest, Lord Roy!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: I wonder. That man said he was Lord Orun's advisor...

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: Wagner? Did something seem wrong with him?

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: He seemed to be in control of everything, as if he were the lord. And Lord Orun is so ill he can't even meet his guests? It all seems strange...

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: Now that you mention it, you have a point.

intro.speaker: Saul
intro.line: Excuse me, Lord Roy. There seem to be an awful lot of soldiers patrolling the castle.

intro.speaker: Dorothy
intro.line: I think they're spying on us.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: What? No...

intro.speaker: Dorothy
intro.line: You noticed? Not bad...

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Who's there?! Show yourself, intruder!

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: Hi!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: And...who might you be?

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: Aw, I'm not one to talk about myself. I overheard that Wagner guy in the main hall though. He said they're gonna ambush you guys.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Lord Orun would never do that!

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: Oh yeah, he's dead, I think. Wagner assassinated him or something.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: What?!

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: He wants to capture you all and turn you over to Bern.

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: Wait, Lord Roy! We can't trust her word so easily!

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: It's up to you whether you trust me or not. But don't say I didn't warn ya!

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: Roy... If what she says is true...

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Let's spring his trap. We'll pretend like we're leaving. If Wagner is after us, he'll try to persuade us to stay.

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: If you wanna get out, go through the north hall! That'll bring you to the courtyard, so you'll be outta here in no time. Good luck!

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: Oh, Lord Roy! Where are you off to? I will escort you back into the castle, so please follow me.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: My apologies, Sir Wagner. I have just received a report of grave importance. Please excuse us, but we must take our leave now.

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: Surely you would appreciate a warm bed after being in the field for so long. Lord Orun would be furious with me if you left without accepting our hospitality.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Don't worry, I shall tell Lord Orun myself that you are not to blame. I ought to at least offer him a greeting anyway. Please show us to his room.

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: As I said, milord, Lord Orun is ill and cannot accept guests.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: If we cannot see him, then we must be off.

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: There's nothing I can offer to make you stay?

intro.speaker: Wagner
intro.line: You leave me no choice then! Guards! Attack! Kill them all, but leave Princess Guinivere alive!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: The girl was right! They were trying to ambush us!

intro.speaker: Saul
intro.line: Lord Roy! If we go this way, we'll be leaving our rear open to attack!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Then we'll seize the whole castle! Everyone, follow my lead!

battle.speaker: Sue
battle.line: All that noise... A battle? What is going on out there?

battle.speaker: Cath
battle.line: Hoo-boy, they're at each other's throats now. Time to pilfer what I can now that security's busy.

battle-talk.speaker: Cath
battle-talk.line: Hey, cut it out! Let go of my arm! Ow! That hurts!

battle-talk.speaker: Roy
battle-talk.line: Oh, I'm sorry. But what are you doing here?

battle-talk.speaker: Cath
battle-talk.line: Well, uh, you know, this and that. I'm a busy girl. Ha ha ha...

battle-talk.speaker: Cath
battle-talk.line: Oh yes, precisely BECAUSE this is a battlefield- Whoops, better watch my tongue...

battle-talk.speaker: Roy
battle-talk.line: Do you have some ulterior motive?

battle-talk.speaker: Roy
battle-talk.line: Wait, is that why you told us the escape route?

battle-talk.speaker: Cath
battle-talk.line: Um, what? Sorry, I'm a little deaf in this ear!

battle-talk.speaker: Cath
battle-talk.line: Don't worry about it! Forget you saw me. Gotta go. Cheers!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: What's a girl doing in here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: My name is Roy. Who are you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Sue
recruit-talk.line: I am Sue. Are you the one causing that noise outside?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Oh, I guess so. We're fighting the castle guards. It's a bit of a long story...

recruit-talk.speaker: Sue
recruit-talk.line: I see. Then I will join your side.

recruit-talk.speaker: Sue
recruit-talk.line: The soldiers of this castle have done me wrong.

recruit-talk.speaker: Sue
recruit-talk.line: Please give me a bow. I will fight with you.

boss.speaker: Wagner
boss.line: Useless guards! But very well. Witness my magic...and bow down before its power!

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: ...You're the granddaughter of one of the chieftains in Sacae?

end.speaker: Sue
end.line: My grandfather is the strongest warrior in Sacae. People call him the Silver Wolf.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: The Silver Wolf... I've heard tales of him. But what are you doing in Lycia? This is a long way from Sacae.

end.speaker: Sue
end.line: Bern invaded Sacae, so the Kutolah clan decided to take up arms. Grandfather had the women and children escape to Lycia, but...

end.speaker: Sue
end.line: There was a traitor. The Djute clan, who turned to Bern's side, ambushed us.

end.speaker: Sue
end.line: We were all separated. I found my way into this land and I was rescued by Lord Orun. But Wagner, his advisor, assassinated Lord Orun and took over the castle.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: And that's when you were captured...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Yes, we will fight for as long as it takes.

end.speaker: Sue
end.line: Then let me join you. Fighting Bern may lead me to Grandfather. Lord Orun deserves vengeance as well.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: We're headed for Ostia, in the west. Sacae is in the east, the opposite direction. Is that all right?

end.speaker: Sue
end.line: I don't mind. No matter where we are, Mother Earth and Father Sky will watch over me.

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Lord Roy! The spy I sent to Ostia has just returned. He says that Ostia is in a state of anarchy!

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: There's been a rebellion among those who want to surrrender to Bern.

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: The spy says that she has been taken hostage. The rebels already took over Castle Ostia and are fighting the loyalist soldiers.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: We must hurry to Ostia! Lilina... Please be safe!
